title: Resident Evil Revelations 2 Repack - 32play
description:
Big hello to all Resident Evil games series fans and this the Complete Season of Resident evil Revelations 2 with more than 14 gb packed in 3.8 ... i hope all of you like it ...



Repack with all 4 episodes + 2 extras dlcs + bonus

Audio : English Only

Subtitles : Multi-12

Nothing ripped with an installation in portable style


Plot

Resident Evil: Revelations 2 will be set between the events of Resident Evil 5 and Resident Evil 6. Claire Redfield will be the main protagonist and Barry Burton's daughter Moira will play a supporting role. In December of 2014, a new trailer revealed Barry as another playable protagonist, and he will be joined by Natalia Korda, who is a little girl with some special abilities. The official cinematic trailer was released in December of 2014.

The first episode sees Claire and Moira being taken to an island facility where the "Afflicted" are in wait. An unknown woman calling herself the "Overseer" watches via cameras and tells them the bracelets on their wrists record fear, as the pair try to find safety. Upon reaching a radio tower, they call for help. Unfortunately, Barry arrives very late as the distress call was actually made months ago. Once he reaches the island, he immediately meets Natalia, a strange little girl. Together, they head to the tower, encountering many dangerous situations along the way. Natalia claims Moira had died 6 months ago, while having a severe headache.


enjoy
